attributes.action: Make MP`s accountable for the actual amount of time they spend doing their job.
attributes.additional_details: In no other walk of life is it morally, legally, contractually or ethically acceptable to accept a job and then take on other roles which negatively affect or have the potential to negatively affect the position accepted.  This is especially relevant to MP`s who have the most important jobs in the country as they influence, effect and change laws/standards/bodies which directly and indirectly the lives of all UK citizens both today and for many many years to come.
attributes.background: Taking account of the ultimate effect MP`s have on all our lives we the `people` they represent have a right to know how much actual time each MP is going to spend doing the job we expect and need them to do.  As the ultimate elected officials they should display ultimate honesty and leadership.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
